====接口文档====

获取新闻列表
/alumni-manage/news/ajax/newsList
传入参数
    size|获取列表数目|int|选填|默认10
返回结果
    {
        code: 200,
        content: {
            newsList: [
                {
                    id: "cc01d8c82a8011e7a39952540092c7fd",
                    time: "01月09日",
                    title: "1"
                },
                {
                    id: "cd01d8c82a8011e7a39952540092c7fd",
                    time: "01月09日",
                    title: "1"
                }
            ]
        },
        msg: "SUCCESS"
    }

============================================
查询新闻详情
/news/ajax/newsInfo
传入参数：
   id|新闻id|String|必填
传出参数：
{
    code: 200,
    content: {
        news: {
            author: "1",
            content: "2",
            endtime: 1493211670000,
            id: "67d7cdfe2a8011e7a39952540092c7fd",
            inserttime: 1493211670000,
            isvalid: "N",
            position: "3",
            publisher: "4",
            starttime: 1493211670000,
            title: "5"
        }
    },
    msg: "SUCCESS"
}
